nodes.text: At some point between the years 19 and 1 BBY, a Neimoidian spoke with smuggler Adah Meborman in a drinking hole on the planet Tatooine. The Neimoidian claimed to be related to Medd Valii, who had accrued a large amount of money during his lifetime. In addition, the Neimoidian told the smuggler that Valii's money had been hidden in the form of pure gold in the arch of the city Tarko-se on the planet Cato Neimoidia. The Neimoidian was later mentioned in a security holo log during the Imperial investigation of Meborman.

The Neimoidian was first mentioned in the "Tarko-se" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, a LucasArts video game released in 2010.
